channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Various potholes, 26th February
item.description:
Various size potholes from the new section of road between crickley hill country park and the small holding going down leckhampton road, in general the road is in bad condition
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): B4070, Coberley, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very deep and sharp pot pole has caused 3 cars to have popped tyres today ! This road is getting worse, 25th February
item.description:
On Birdlip hill there are loads of pot holes that need filing .. the road is very dangerous and you cannot stop to take a photo ! This will need closing to re surface properly as the water runs down it and takes the tarmac away
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): B4070, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street lights all still out on Pilford Avenue, 25th February

item.title: Dangerous pot hole, 25th February
item.description:
Extremely large pot hole due to excessive traffic use. It's about 50cm wide.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ermin Way, Badgeworth, Tewkesbury

item.title: The edge of the road has degraded leaving a long trench which would be dangerous if a car wheel or cyclist went into it., 25th February
item.description:
On the left had side of the road going towards Gretton. Just before Gotherington Nurseries.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Gretton Road, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pothole near to the chicane to slow traffic, 25th February
item.description:
Near the chicane, heading towards Shurdington Road coming from Sue Ryder. Large pothole, getting bigger by the day ! Can’t avoid it as the road has now been made to a give & take road. Utilities have come across the road & where the road meets the fields (no edging stones), it’s turned to a large pothole !
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Road, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There is a dangerous hole eroded at the drain cover. It is immediately after the petrol station, on the left hand side of the road going north., 25th February
item.description:
As above
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A435, Gotherington, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A40, Shipton, Cotswold

item.title: There are 2 Very deep pot holes on Leckhampton hill close together, I managed to dodge the first but hit the second resulting in a split and instant flat tyre., 25th February
item.description:
As I’m unfamiliar with the road and house names in that area I would say the holes are about 1 mile heading towards and before The Star Centre.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 53, Leckhampton Road, Leckhampton, Cheltenham

item.title: Graffiti on Pittville Park Bridge, 25th February
